item.title: Example Page
R - Notes | Examples | Recipes
item.description:
Introduction This project contains notes and recipes in R, especially pertaining to data science. The purpose is to have a handy reference to refresh concepts / syntax via examples and also share the functions that I develop to streamline workflow.
References Datacamp courses Quantitative Analyst career track in R Tidyverse courses Edx : HarvardX: PH125.1x Data Science: R Basics Notes Rprofile and user files ?
